mapper.sql: id, data_type, file_name, ext, size, file_md5, path, parent_dir_id, create_time, update_time, status
mapper.insert: insert into sys_file_info (data_type, file_name, ext, size, path, parent_dir_id) values (#{sysFileInfo.dataType}, #{sysFileInfo.fileName}, #{sysFileInfo.ext}, #{sysFileInfo.size}, #{sysFileInfo.path}, #{sysFileInfo.parentDirId}, )
mapper.select: select from sys_file_info where parent_dir_id = #{parentDirId} and status = 1
